problem_text_cn: 如图,△ABC中,D、E分别为AB、AC的中点,已知△ADE的面积为1,那么△ABC的面积是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, D and E are the midpoints of AB and AC respectively. It is known that the area of ​​△ADE is N_0, then the area of ​​△ABC is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵D、E分别是AB、AC的中点,∴DE是△ABC的中位线,∴DE∥BC,\frac{DE}{BC}=\frac{1}{2},∴△ADE∽△ABC,∴\frac{S_{\bigtriangleupADE}}{S_{\bigtriangleupABC}}=(\frac{1}{2})²=\frac{1}{4},∵△ADE的面积为1,∴S~△ABC~=4．故选:C．
raw_comment: 本题考查了相似三角形的判定及性质、三角形中位线定理,熟练掌握三角形中位线定理,证明△ADE∽△ABC是解答本题的关键．
